name: E.T.P.D
description:
The year is 2023. Aliens known as the Locust swarm have invaded earth and deployed a parasite infecting 85% of the population. Play as a Extra Terrestrial Parasite Detainment soldier unit, and find samples of the parasite, rescue survivors, and fight against the locust parasite.

Features:

Top down shooter gameplay

Secret references to popular survival horror games

3 infected types

3 levels

CREDITS:

I made the game, but Liam, the master of synthesizers, made the sweet music.

The games art direction is mainly just reskinned Kenney assets, so if you want to check them out, this is their website https://www.kenney.nl/
